abstract.p: Methods and systems for measuring and gathering data relating to publication usage by participants in publication readership studies. Some methods and systems employ portable monitors carried by participants of the studies along with publications fitted with various devices, such as piezoelectric transducers, RFID tags and others devices and circuits.

abstract.p: Methods and systems for measuring and gathering data relating to publication usage by participants in publication readership studies. Some methods and systems employ portable monitors carried by participants of the studies along with publications fitted with various devices, such as piezoelectric transducers, RFID tags and others devices and circuits.

nplcit.text: Not yet advised

abstract.p: Data concerning usage of a publication (1000) is gathered by means of detecting a condition, for example a page (1010, 1020) of the publication (1000) being subject to a force associated with flexing by a user reading the publication (1000). Raw data extending over time is processed (1180) in order to characterize usage of the publication (1000). Such forces may be detected by means of a piezoelectric element (1070), or by means of a motion sensor. The usage data may be communicated to a portable monitor (1170) carried by the user. The means may further comprise a light sensor, temperature sensor and/or proximity sensor and the portable monitor (1170) may receive position data. Individuals' usage of magazines, newspapers and books my thereby be monitored.

abstract.p: Methods and systems for measuring and gathering data relating to publication usage by participants in publication readership studies. Some methods and systems employ portable monitors carried by participants of the studies along with publications fitted with various devices, such as piezoelectric transducers, RFID tags and others devices and circuits.

L'invention concerne des procédés et des systèmes qui permettent de mesurer et de collecter des données concernant le taux de lecture de publications par des participants à des études sur le taux de lecture de publications. Certains procédés et systèmes font appel à des dispositifs de contrôle portables portés par les participants aux études, et à des publications équipées de divers dispositifs tels que des transducteurs piézoélectriques, des étiquettes RFID et autres dispositifs et circuits.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COLLECTE DE DONNEES CONCERNANT LE TAUX DE LECTURE DE PUBLICATIONS

abstract.p: Methods and systems for measuring and gathering data relating to publication usage by participants in publication readership studies. Some methods and systems employ portable monitors (24) carried by participants of the studies along with publications (20) fitted with various devices, such as piezoelectric transducers, RFID tags and other devices and circuits.

L'invention concerne des procédés et des systèmes qui permettent de mesurer et de collecter des données concernant le taux de lecture de publications par des participants à des études sur le taux de lecture de publications. Certains procédés et systèmes font appel à des dispositifs de contrôle portables portés par les participants aux études, et à des publications équipées de divers dispositifs tels que des transducteurs piézoélectriques, des étiquettes RFID et autres dispositifs et circuits.
